# Edward B. Warman

Edward Barrett Warman (April 29, 1847 â€“ November 26, 1931) was an American psychologist and health expert. He edited a column in the Los Angeles Times called "The Care of the Body", and he authored several books about physical culture. He advocated daily physical exercise.
Selected works

*Warman, Edward B. (1897). [https://archive.org/details/physicaltraining00warm/page/n3/mode/2up Physical Training Simplified]. American Sports Pub. Co.
